name: Bangla Numbers in Date and Time
author: Arif Nezami

sections.description: This plugin helps to display the Date and Time of post publishing in Bangla Numbers. But doesn’t show date according to Bangla calender, it follows Georgian calender . The plugin doesn’t need Bangla language pack installation, it can work by itself.
sections.installation:
1. Upload Bangla Numbers in Date and Time.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory and extract the zipped file.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

short_description: This plugins helps to dispaly the Date and Time of post publishing in Bangla Numbers. But doesn't show date acroding to Bangla calender
